result.title: Help with Round #283(Div. 1 C)
result.content:
I have tried to implement the solution for http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/496/E based on what I could understand by translating the editorial to english. My code is failing on 10th test case. Please help me find a bug in my code. Thanks in advance. :)

http://codeforces.com/contest/496/submission/9187611

EDIT: Accepted!!
